mapper.sql: a.carr_id AS "carrId", a.carr_desc AS "carrDesc", a.carr_id_jd AS "carrIdJd", a.carr_id_taobao AS "carrIdTaobao", a.carr_name AS "carrName", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.order_cnt AS "orderCnt", a.carr_price AS "carrPrice", a.carr_price_add AS "carrPriceAdd"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_carriage( carr_id, carr_desc, carr_id_jd, carr_id_taobao, carr_name, create_time, order_cnt, carr_price, carr_price_add ) VALUES ( #{carrId}, #{carrDesc}, #{carrIdJd}, #{carrIdTaobao}, #{carrName}, #{createTime}, #{orderCnt}, #{carrPrice}, #{carrPriceAdd} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_carriage SET carr_id = #{carrId}, carr_desc = #{carrDesc}, carr_id_jd = #{carrIdJd}, carr_id_taobao = #{carrIdTaobao}, carr_name = #{carrName}, create_time = #{createTime}, order_cnt = #{orderCnt}, carr_price = #{carrPrice}, carr_price_add = #{carrPriceAdd} WHERE id = #{id}
